messages.title: THIS IS OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: Marisha Ray has worked hard for Barnet. Her mother grew up here and Marisha spent much of her childhood here. Marisha studied physics at Trinity College, Cambridge. As a trustee of her university's Cambridge West Area School governor board member and on the executive body of a London university, Marisha understands higher education issues. An active and prominent member of the women's aid national board, councilor on London councils, leader of charities working with gang-impacted communities, and people's project, Marisha's history on mental health and learning disability is noted. Additionally, Marisha has extensive commercial and industrial experience having taken her fight to justice for companies. She will stand for you and your family.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Help Marisha Ray stop a hard Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservatives are dragging us out of the Single Market. Britain to leave single market says Theresa May. Help Marisha Ray stop a hard Brexit. Corbyn to order Labour MPs to vote for Theresa's deal.

politicalExperience.achievements: Active and prominent member of the women’s aid national board, councillor on London councils, leader of charities working with gang-impacted communities, and people's project.

contactInformation.address: 8 New Barnes House, New Barnet, Herts EN5 1SB
